name: UI WARS
description:
UI Wars is a fast paced challenging arcade game where you move around the arena battling wave after wave of the evil hexagon army!

How far can you make it before you are blown up?

UI Wars is currently in open Alpha (not beta) with the potential of major changes to improve structure as needed. There will be more additions as time goes on.

As an early adopter you can help shape the game! Send in your thoughts and requests to our email (Sam [at] ThinkParticle [dot] com).

Controls:

WASD - move

Left Mouse Button - Fire

Shift + E - Save Screenshot

F11 - Toggle Fullscreen
